messages: A hearing has been booked for your appeal.
The evidence you sent was received by us on the 4 February 2017. This will be submitted to the tribunal for consideration
The DWP have responded to your appeal. They have not changed their original decision.
We are now in the process of booking a hearing for your appeal. We will contact you within 6 weeks to tell you when and where your hearing is.
We received the evidence you sent us on 08/05/2016. This will be submitted to the tribunal for consideration.
The DWP now have to respond to your appeal before 20/06/16. We'll be in touch when they do.
